segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I notice the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying dishes, but the faucet is running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is spilling everywhere, and she's oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh no, that puddle is growing so fast on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if she slips and falls? That would be terrible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to something risky too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that shaky stool, stretching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It could collapse under him any moment, and he'd come tumbling down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, encouraging him with her outstretched hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful, but inside it's a hazard zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup makes me anxious just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stop this before an accident happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
